docs.snippet: Mr. Trump’s dual speeches in Mexico City and Phoenix were so jarring that his true vision and intentions on immigration were hard to discern....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump’s dual speeches in Mexico City and Phoenix were so jarring that his true vision and intentions on immigration were hard to discern.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump travels to Mexico for joint news conference with Pres Enrique Pena Nieto to remake his image on divisive issue of immigration hours before heading to Phoenix, where he renewed his promise to build wall and make Mexico pay for it; his two speeches are so jarring that his true vision and intentions on immigration are hard to discern.

headline.main: Donald Trump Gambles on Immigration but Sends Conflicting Signals
headline.print_headline: Trump Gambles on Immigration in Trip and Rally

byline.contributor: Azam Ahmed and Nick Corasaniti contributed reporting.

docs.snippet: The president made his terrible summer worse by inviting the Republican candidate to his palace....
docs.lead_paragraph: The president made his terrible summer worse by inviting the Republican candidate to his palace.
docs.abstract: Ioan Grillo Op-Ed article argues Mexican Pres Enrique Pena Nieto's meeting with Donald Trump amounted to lost opportunity to rebuke Trump for his offensive positions regarding Mexicans and damaged Pena Nieto's public image; contends botched meeting reflects Pena Nieto's larger failings in governing major nation.

headline.main: Why Did Peña Nieto Invite Trump to Mexico?

docs.snippet: A trip to Mexico and a speech in Phoenix don’t add substance to Donald Trump’s bluster about thwarting evil foreigners....
docs.lead_paragraph: A trip to Mexico and a speech in Phoenix don’t add substance to Donald Trump’s bluster about thwarting evil foreigners.
docs.abstract: Editorial rebukes Donald J Trump for reverting to hard line anti-immigration position in Phoenix speech just hours after visiting Mexico, where he peddled softer stance in appearance with Pres Enrique Pena Nieto; argues Trump's proposals, to degree they can be discerned at all, are in any case unworkable, and only serve to stoke divisiveness.

docs.snippet: The party is registering more new voters than the G.O.P., and its overall losses aren’t affecting the actual vote as much as some might think....
docs.lead_paragraph: The party is registering more new voters than the G.O.P., and its overall losses aren’t affecting the actual vote as much as some might think.
docs.abstract: The Upshot; analysis of voting data from state officials and other sources implies Democrats have edge in upcoming elections that goes beyond party registration figures; notes many new and younger voters are registering as Independents but lean toward Democrat.

headline.main: Democrats’ Edge in Voter Registration Is Declining, but Looks Can Be Deceiving
headline.print_headline: Dip in Democratic Voter Lead Might Matter Less Than It Appears

docs.snippet: For weeks, Donald Trump flirted with a self-described "softening" of the hard-line immigration policies that propelled him to the Republican nomination, raising the hopes of party officials, some Hispanic leaders and skeptical voters unnerved by h...
docs.lead_paragraph: For weeks, Donald Trump flirted with a self-described "softening" of the hard-line immigration policies that propelled him to the Republican nomination, raising the hopes of party officials, some Hispanic leaders and skeptical voters unnerved by his presidential candidacy.

headline.main: For Donald Trump, a Day of Political Whiplash on Immigration
headline.print_headline: For Donald Trump, a Day of Political Whiplash on Immigration
